info.title: Utility Management System API
info.description: API documentation for the Laravel Utility Management System

post.description: Authenticate a user and receive an access token and a refresh token.
Uses a refresh token to generate a new access token.

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or expired refresh token

post.description: Logs out the current authenticated user by invalidating their token.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all contracts.

post.description: Creates a new contract and assigns a tenant to a room.

get.description: Returns the details of a specific contract by its ID.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing contract.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract to update

get.summary: Get a list of contract types
get.description: Returns a paginated list of all contract types.

post.description: Creates a new contract type with specified details.

get.description: Returns the details of a specific contract type by its ID.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing contract type.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the contract type to update

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all receipts.
Returns the details of a specific receipt by its ID.

404.description: The receipt you are looking for does not exist!

put.description: Updates the details of an existing receipt.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the receipt to update

404.description: The receipt you are looking for does not exist!

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all tenants.
Returns the details of a specific tenant by their ID.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing tenant.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the tenant to update

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users.
Returns the details of a specific user by their ID.

put.description: Updates the details of an existing user.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the user to update

createdDate.description: The date the contract was created

paidDate.description: The date the receipt was paid

tags.name: Contract Types
tags.description: API Endpoints for managing contract types
